version_description:
Enjoy this new app update.
We brought to you for the first time in the region the Skincare Augmented reality tool. In few simple steps get the analysis of your skin and know what is your skin age!
This feature will recommend you the best products for your skincare routine.
*This is not a medical device and for professional skin analysis consult a dermatologist.

- Use map to add delivery address from home screen or during checkout.
- Option to pay for failed credit card orders using the payment link in push notification, email or "My Orders" section of the app.
- Enjoy the "Make it a gift" new feature with a special wrapping service.
- You can now check what is frequently bought with your chosen item.
- Improving overall experience by adding a few fixes.
